CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 9, 1960, pg. A15, reads: "Boost Better Books - The AME Church is launching a drive to train its youth to read better books, through efforts of the national YPD director, Mrs. Alma A. Polk, second from left. Prominent local leaders who are aiding Mrs. Polk in this effort are Miss Martha Tyson, left, Miss Eleanor Walker member of Carnegie Library staff and Mrs. Marion Bryant, local business woman. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Martha Tyson, Alma A. Polk, Eleanor Walker, and Marion Bryant posed with book in library for AME Church better literature campaign
